title: 【Dual Degree Seminars】 - Save the Date!
department: 國際事務處國際合作組
author: 陳良愛
content:
分類： 活動公告
來源： 國際事務處國際合作組 - 陳良愛 - ice@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話5107
對象： 全校學生
標題： 【Dual Degree Seminars】 - Save the Date!
日期： Mon, 30 Oct 2023 10:43:01 +0800
附檔： 1019_DUAL DEGREE SEMINAR.jpg (1 MB)   
We are thrilled to invite you to our upcoming School-Level Dual Degree Seminars. These seminars will provide valuable insights into the application qualifications, procedures, and required documents for our dual degree programs. Distinguished faculty members from our partner universities will guide you through the process.

This semester's seminars will focus on the dual degree opportunities available at Rennes School of Business, University of Texas at Arlington, San Francisco State University, and University of Technology Sydney.

Attendees who participate in and sign in at all four school seminars are eligible to enter a lucky draw with a chance to win various exciting prizes!

【Seminar 1: Rennes School of Business】
Date: October 30
Time: 15:00-16:00
Location: Room 301, Administration Building
Online Meeting Room: https://meet.google.com/zyu-smjp-xtr

【Seminar 2: University of Technology Sydney + University of Texas at Arlington】
Date: October 31
Time: 10:00-12:00
Location: Room 301, Administration Building
Online Meeting Room: https://meet.google.com/ctu-tabm-usu

【Seminar 3: University of Technology Sydney + University of Texas at Arlington】
Date: November 1
Time: 10:00-12:00
Location: Room 301, Administration Building
Online Meeting Room: https://meet.google.com/rhw-wvnf-gke

【Seminar 4: Rennes School of Business】
Date: November 3
Time: 15:00-16:00
Location: Room 301, Administration Building
Online Meeting Room: https://meet.google.com/spn-xeia-cxy

【Seminar 5: San Francisco State University】
Date: November 9
Time: 10:00-11:00
Location: Room 416, Administration Building
Online Meeting Room: https://meet.google.com/sfx-gheg-fry

【Seminar 6: San Francisco State University】(Faculty from San Francisco State University visit NDHU for presentations)
Date: November 27
Time: 11:00-12:00
Location: Room 301, Administration Building
Online Meeting Room: https://meet.google.com/jjb-jejt-tjm

Each seminar will include Q&A time, providing you with the opportunity to ask questions and gain a deeper understanding of the programs. We encourage all students interested in dual degree programs to participate actively and plan their course schedules wisely.

These seminars will be conducted both in-person and online simultaneously, promising rich and engaging content. We encourage all students to seize this opportunity and participate enthusiastically.
